TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComparable`1<- T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IComparable

span.span: The type of object to compare.

summary.span: 定义由值类型或类实现的通用比较方法，旨在创建特定于类型的比较方法以对实例进行排序。

span.span: Defines a generalized comparison method that a value type or class implements to create a type-specific comparison method for ordering or sorting its instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口由其值可以排序或排序的类型实现, 并提供强类型的比较方法以对泛型集合对象的成员进行排序。This interface is implemented by types whose values can be ordered or sorted and provides a strongly typed comparison method for ordering members of a generic collection object. 例如, 一个数字可以大于第二个数字, 一个字符串可以在另一个字符串之前以字母顺序出现。For example, one number can be larger than a second number, and one string can appear in alphabetical order before another. 它要求实现类型定义一个方法, 该方法指示当前实例在排序顺序中的位置是在同一类型的第二个对象之前、之后还是与其相同。It requires that implementing types define a single method, , that indicates whether the position of the current instance in the sort order is before, after, or the same as a second object of the same type. 通常, 不会直接从开发人员代码中调用方法。Typically, the method is not called directly from developer code. 相反, 它由和等方法自动调用。Instead, it is called automatically by methods such as and . 通常, 提供实现的类型还实现接口。Typically, types that provide an implementation also implement the interface. 接口定义方法, 该方法确定实现类型的实例的相等性。The interface defines the method, which determines the equality of instances of the implementing type. 方法的实现必须返回具有以下三个值之一的, 如下表所示。The implementation of the method must return an that has one of three values, as shown in the following table. |值Value|含义Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |小于零Less than zero|此对象在排序顺序中位于方法所指定的对象之前。This object precedes the object specified by the method in the sort order.| |零Zero|此当前实例在排序顺序中与方法参数指定的对象出现在同一位置。This current instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as the object specified by the method argument.| |大于零Greater than zero|此当前实例位于排序顺序中由方法自变量指定的对象之后。This current instance follows the object specified by the method argument in the sort order.| 所有数值类型 (例如和 ) 均实现, 如、和。 All numeric types (such as and ) implement , as do , , and . 自定义类型还应提供自己的实现来启用对象实例的排序或排序。Custom types should also provide their own implementation of to enable object instances to be ordered or sorted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单 `Temperature`对象的实现。The following code example illustrates the implementation of for a simple `Temperature` object. 该示例创建一个具有`Temperature`对象键的字符串集合, 并将多对的温度和字符串按顺序添加到列表中。The example creates a collection of strings with `Temperature` object keys, and adds several pairs of temperatures and strings to the list out of sequence. 在对方法的调用中 , 集合使用实现对列表条目进行排序, 然后按温度的增加顺序显示这些条目。In the call to the method, the collection uses the implementation to sort the list entries, which are then displayed in order of increasing temperature. [!code-cpp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 将接口的类型参数替换为实现此接口的类型。

span.span: Replace the type parameter of the interface with the type that is implementing this interface.

para.span: 如果实现, 则应 重载、、和运算符, 以返回与一致的值。

span.span: If you implement , you should overload the , , , and operators to return values that are consistent with .
In addition, you should also implement .

para.span: 有关完整信息, 请参阅一文。

span.span: See the article for complete information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(!T other) cil managed
Public Function CompareTo (other As T) As Integer

param.name: other
param.span: 与此实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 将当前实例与同一类型的另一个对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前实例在排序顺序中的位置是位于另一个对象之前、之后还是与其位置相同。

span.span: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.

returns.span: 一个值，指示要比较的对象的相对顺序。

span.span: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared.
The return value has these meanings:
Value
Meaning
Less than zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中位于 之前。

span.span: This instance precedes in the sort order.
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as .
Greater than zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中位于 之后。

span.span: This instance follows in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供强类型的比较方法以对泛型集合对象的成员进行排序。 provides a strongly typed comparison method for ordering members of a generic collection object. 因此, 通常不会直接从开发人员代码中调用它。Because of this, it is usually not called directly from developer code. 相反, 它由和等方法自动调用。Instead, it is called automatically by methods such as and . 此方法只是定义, 必须由特定的类或值类型实现才能使其生效。This method is only a definition and must be implemented by a specific class or value type to have effect. "返回值" 部分中指定的比较 ("先于"、"与" 的位置相同) 的含义取决于特定实现。The meaning of the comparisons specified in the Return Values section ("precedes", "occurs in the same position as", and "follows) depends on the particular implementation. 按照定义, 任何对象比较大于`null`, 两个 null 引用的比较结果相等。By definition, any object compares greater than `null`, and two null references compare equal to each other. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单 `Temperature`对象的实现。The following code example illustrates the implementation of for a simple `Temperature` object. 该示例创建一个具有`Temperature`对象键的字符串集合, 并将多对的温度和字符串按顺序添加到列表中。The example creates a collection of strings with `Temperature` object keys, and adds several pairs of temperatures and strings to the list out of sequence. 在对方法的调用中 , 集合使用实现对列表条目进行排序, 然后按温度的增加顺序显示这些条目。In the call to the method, the collection uses the implementation to sort the list entries, which are then displayed in order of increasing temperature. [!code-cpp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 对于对象 A、B 和 C, 必须满足以下条件:

span.span: For objects A, B, and C, the following must be true:
A.CompareTo(A) is required to return zero.

para.span: 如果CompareTo (B)返回零, 则需要CompareTo (A)以返回零。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero, then B.CompareTo(A) is required to return zero.

para.span: 如果CompareTo (B)返回零, CompareTo (c)返回零, 则需要CompareTo (c)以返回零。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero and B.CompareTo(C) returns zero, then A.CompareTo(C) is required to return zero.

para.span: 如果CompareTo (B)返回的值不是零, 则需要CompareTo (A)来返回相反的符号值。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value other than zero, then B.CompareTo(A) is required to return a value of the opposite sign.

para.span: 如果CompareTo (B)返回一个不等于零的值, 而CompareTo (c)返回与相同的符号 值, 则需要CompareTo (c)来返回与相同的符号的值和。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value that is not equal to zero, and B.CompareTo(C) returns a value of the same sign as , then A.CompareTo(C) is required to return a value of the same sign as and .

para.span: 使用方法来确定类的实例的排序。

span.span: Use the method to determine the ordering of instances of a class.
